org.omnaest.utils.spring.scope
Class LocaleBeanScope

java.lang.Object
  org.omnaest.utils.spring.scope.LocaleBeanScope
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.config.Scope, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
public class LocaleBeanScope
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.config.Scope, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

A bean Scope using Locales as separation aspect. A given LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver is used to resolve a Locale for every request for a bean and for the creation of a Locale aware BeanScopeThreadContextManager with calling newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager().

An example is: 

 
 final Locale locale = new Locale( language, country );
 BeanScopeThreadContextManager beanScopeThreadContextManager = localeBeanScope.newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager( locale );
                  
 threadPoolTaskExecutor.submit( new BeanScopeAwareRunnableDecorator( new Runnable(){...}, beanScopeThreadContextManager );
An example for an annotated bean looks like: 
 @Service("localeScopedBean")
 @Scope(value = LocaleBeanScope.LOCALE, proxyMode = ScopedProxyMode.TARGET_CLASS)
 public class LocaleScopedBean implements LocaleAware
 {
 ...
 }
Whereby the LocaleBeanScope.LocaleAware interface is optional. If it is present the Locale will be injected into the created bean instance the first time it is used.

Note: The LocaleBeanScope allows to use a InheritableThreadLocal instance and therefore Thread to Thread inheritance.

Author:
Omnaest
See Also:
BeanScopeThreadContextManager, BeanScopeAwareRunnableDecorator, BeanScopeAwareCallableDecorator, LOCALE

static interface LocaleBeanScope.LocaleAware
          If a spring bean is declared under the LocaleBeanScope it can implements this interface to get the Locale injected after creating the bean instance.

Method Detail

newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager

public BeanScopeThreadContextManager newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager()
Returns a BeanScopeThreadContextManager instance which is already aware of the Locale it manages. To resolve the Locale the LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver.resolveLocale() is invoked every time by calling this method.

Returns:

newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager

public BeanScopeThreadContextManager newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager(LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver localeResolver)
Returns a BeanScopeThreadContextManager instance which is already aware of the Locale it manages. To resolve the Locale the LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver.resolveLocale() is invoked every time by calling this method.

Parameters:
localeResolver - LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver
Returns:

newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager

public BeanScopeThreadContextManager newLocalAwareBeanScopeThreadContextManager(Locale locale)
Returns a BeanScopeThreadContextManager instance which is aware of the given Locale. This Locale it used to manage the Threads context.

Parameters:
locale - Locale
Returns:

newLocaleAwareRunnableDecorator

public Runnable newLocaleAwareRunnableDecorator(Runnable runnable,
                                                LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver localeResolver)
Returns a new instance of a Runnable which manages the Locale awareness of the running Thread. To resolve the Locale the LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver is used.

Parameters:
runnable -
localeResolver -
